data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
You can use it to filter outgoing e-mail, to see if you're writting
    in a way that'll be easily undertandable, etc.

    With Text::Beautify, you go from

    " some badly written text ,,you see ??"

    to

    "Some badly written text, you see?"

    You can enable/disable each beautifying feature by itself.
